member.name: DEVICE_TRIM_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: Used in conjunction with theIOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY request to retrieve the trim descriptor data for a device.

member.name: DEVICE_TRIM_DESCRIPTOR.Version
member.summary: Contains the size of this structure, in bytes. The value of this member will change as members are added to the structure.

member.name: DEVICE_TRIM_DESCRIPTOR.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the data returned, in bytes. This may include data that follows this structure.

member.name: DEVICE_TRIM_DESCRIPTOR.TrimEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether trim is enabled for the device.
